Rhythmyx 6 Public API
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package com.percussion.xmldom

Class Summary
ProcessServerPageTags This class provides all functionality to handle server page code for the split and merge processes.
PSNodePrinter Deprecated. moved to com.percussion.xml package to avoid cyclic dependency after it is being used in a class in com.percussion.cms package.
PSSaxErrorHandler An error handler for SAX parsers which keeps the errors in a list accessible after parsing is complete.
PSStylesheetCacheManager Caches stylesheets as PSCachedStylesheet in a Map keyed by URL
PSXdCopyDom A Rhythmyx post exit that copies an XML DOM tree from a temporary private object into the result document.
PSXdDomToFile A Rhythmyx extension that copies a temporary XML document into an attached file.
PSXdDomToParams A Rhythmyx pre-exit that examines a temporary XML object and extracts HTML parameters.
PSXdDomToText A Rhythmyx extension that copies a temporary XML document into a field.
PSXdFileToTree A Rhythmyx post-exit to load an XML document from the file system and add it to the result document
PSXdMoveInputDocument This preprocessor exit moves the XML InputDocument into an HTML parameter and removes it from the request context.
PSXdMultiTextToTree A Rhythmyx post-exit called to transform a text node into an XML tree and add it to the result Document.
PSXdProcessRelatedLinks A Rhythmyx pre-exit called to process inline related links that may exist in an HTML body field.
PSXdRemoveElements A Rhythmyx post-exit that removes un-necessary nodes from the XML result document.
PSXdTextCleanup A Rhythmyx extension used to translate a text field, parse it, tidy it, scan it for inline links and then place it back into the same field.
PSXdTextToDom A Rhythmyx extension used to translate a text field into a temporary XML DOM document.
PSXdTextToTree A Rhythmyx post-exit called to transform a text node into an XML tree and add it to the result Document.
PSXdTransformDom A Rhythmyx extension that applies an XSL Stylesheet to a temporary XML document.
PSXdTransformDomToText A Rhythmyx extension that applies an XSL Stylesheet to a temporary XML document and stores the result as a text string.
PSXmlDocumentBuilder Deprecated. Use com.percussion.xml.PSXmlDocumentBuilder instead
PSXmlDomContext This class provides centralized parameter passing, exception handling and trace message support for the xmldom package.
PSXmlDomUtils A set of utility routines for the XML document processing extensions.
PSXmlTreeWalker Deprecated. Use com.percussion.xml.PSXmlTreeWalker instead
